text: innum (munnirunta) napimarkalutaiya aticcuvatukalileye maryamin kumararakiya isavai, avarukku mun irunta tavrattai unmaippatuttupavaraka nam totarac ceytom; avarukku nam injilaiyum kotuttom;. Atil nervaliyum oliyum iruntana. Atu tanakku munnirukkum tavrattai unmaippatuttuvataka iruntatu. Atu payapaktiyutaiyavarkalukku ner valikattiyakavum nallupatecamakavum ullatu
